Game: Dungeon Explorer 2008-04-08T00:00:00-07:00 Dungeon Explorer: Meiyaku no Tobira (????????????? ????) and Dungeon Explorer: Jashin no Ryouiki (????????????? ?????) are a pair of 2007 action RPG video games for the PlayStation Portable and Nintendo DS, respectively. Both games were localized and released as Dungeon Explorer: Warriors of Ancient Arts in the United States and as simply Dungeon Explorer in Europe. The games are related to the PC Engine game Dungeon Explorer. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/cc47dc0d-8fdf-4056-a8bf-d2983c36721d.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/ff75439d-ded0-4663-90c3-710628e88fc8.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/7ba6c175-b730-409c-83f9-299ac0d9b396.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/efe18502-70b6-41c4-a9e0-366a95bcd3a7.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/851a6a8b-7fd0-45ce-968d-db3d32780330.png https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dungeon_Explorer:_Warriors_of_Ancient_Arts E10+ - Everyone 10+ Role-Playing Hudson Soft Hudson Soft
